DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the pharmacokinetics, safety, and tolerability of the co-administration of VCH-222 and telaprevir in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Drug-Drug Interaction Study of VCH-222 and Telaprevir in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy males, and/or healthy females of nonchildbearing potential, aged 18 to 55 years (inclusive) Body mass index (BMI) between 18 and 31 kg/m2 (inclusive) and weight > 50 kg Women of child bearing potential Subjects positive for Hepatitis B, Hepatitis C, or HIV Subjects who have participated in a clinical study involving administration of an investigational drug within 2 months
